  • Changelog

    Function reference

    Analysis Functions

    These functions are used to conduct inventory analysis with allometric models.

    allometric_models
    A table of installed allometric models
    predict()
    Predict with an allometric model

    Contributor Functions

    These functiosn are used to contribute and install models in allometric

    add_model()
    Add a model to a publication
    add_set()
    Add a set of models to a publication
    fia_trees
    FIA Trees Data
    FixedEffectsModel()
    Create a fixed effects model
    FixedEffectsSet()
    Create a set of fixed effects models
    MixedEffectsModel()
    Create a mixed effects model
    MixedEffectsSet()
    Create a set of mixed effects models
    model_call()
    Get the function call for a model
    predict_allo()
    Predict allometric attributes using a column of allometric models
    Publication()
    Create a publication that contains allometric models

    Allometric Models

    Models are contained in publications, which are listed below.

    Stem Volume Models

    bell_1981
    Bell, Marshall, and Johnson (1981)
    brackett_1977
    Brackett (1977)
    bruce_1974
    Bruce and DeMars (1974)
    chojnacky_1985
    Chojnacky (1985)
    chojnacky_1988
    Chojnacky (1988)
    hahn_1984
    Hahn (1984)
    hahn_1991
    Hahn and Hansen (1991)
    hann_2011
    Hann (2011)
    myers_1964
    Myers (1964)
    myers_1972
    Myers and Edminster (1972)
    poudel_2019
    Poudel, Temesgen, Radtke et al. (2019)
    rustagi_1991
    Rustagi and Loveless Jr (1991)
    scott_1981
    Scott (1981)
    vibrans_2015
    Vibrans, Moser, Oliveira et al. (2015)

    Stem Diameter Models

    bluhm_2007
    Bluhm, Garber, and Hibbs (2007)
    hann_2011
    Hann (2011)
    hibbs_2007
    Hibbs, Bluhm, and Garber (2007)
    kozak_1988
    Kozak (1988)
    poudel_2018
    Poudel, Temesgen, and Gray (2018)

    Stem Height Models

    feldpausch_2012
    Feldpausch, Lloyd, Lewis et al. (2012)
    hahn_1984
    Hahn (1984)
    hann_1987
    Hann, Scrivani, and others (1987)
    moore_1996
    Moore, Zhang, and Stuck (1996)
    temesgen_2008
    Temesgen, Monleon, and Hann (2008)

    Tree Biomass Models

    feldpausch_2012
    Feldpausch, Lloyd, Lewis et al. (2012)

    IFFSC (2022)
    montero_2005
    Montero, Ruiz-Peinado, and Munoz (2005)
    poudel_2019
    Poudel, Temesgen, Radtke et al. (2019)
    uller_2019
    Uller, Zimermann Oliveira, Klitzke et al. (2019)

    Stump Volume Models

    hahn_1984
    Hahn (1984)
